data.id: Code for Philly/Megalithic Timeline OpenSource Project

attributes.description: Megalithic Timeline is an open-source project I wanted to build in order to convey a better history of human made megalithic structures throughout history. I've been fascinated with uncovering the anthropology of the people who built these unbelievable monuments which have withheld the test of time and forces of nature to tell us about our past.
attributes.name: Megalithic Timeline OpenSource Project
